item.title: Real Heroes: Firefighter HD coming to PS5 on December 6
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/real-heroes-firefighter-hd-coming-to-ps5-on-december-6

  • PS5

Currently available for Xbox One and PC.

Ziggurat Interactive will release a PlayStation 5 version of first-person firefighting game Real Heroes: Firefighter HD via PlayStation Store on December 6, the company announced.

Real Heroes: Firefighter HD first launched for PC via Steam and GOG on January 21, 2021, followed by Xbox One on March 30, 2022. It is a remastered version of Real Heroes: Firefighter, which first launched for Wii on August 4, 2009, followed by 3DS on September 12, 2012, PC via Steam on March 14, 2017, Switch on November 27, 2019, and PlayStation 4 on March 10, 2020.

Here is an overview of the game, via Ziggurat Interactive:

About

Don the soot-stained boots of an everyday hero as a newly graduated academy cadet getting their start in a big city fire station. Charging head-first into danger is all part of the job description!

Real Heroes: Firefighter HD is a first-person firefighting and rescue action game where players take on the heroic role of a real firefighter. Beginning their career at a fire station in Los Angeles, the game’s hero must learn the tools of the trade, battle massive blazes, and rescue citizens from deadly infernos. It’s time to put on a fresh pair of turnout pants, grab a Halligan, and take to the streets to battle man’s deadliest foe—fire!

Key Features

  • Realistic fire technology creates an incredible adversary that feels “alive” and dangerous
  • A career mode featuring more than nine levels and locations
  • Use real-life firefighting tools, including hoses, axes, hydraulic rescue tools, Halligans, and more
  • An all-star Hollywood voice cast including James Marsters (Buffy: The Vampire Slayer), Jack McGee (Rescue Me), Michael Jace (The Shield),
  • Jamie Kennedy (Ghost Whisperer), and Jenette Goldstein (Aliens).
  • PlayStation 5-exclusive haptic effects for DualSense gamepads.
